38a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs cing so// sgra cing so// dri cing dmigs so// ro cing dmigs so// reg cing so// chos cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang
38a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
38a7('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
38b1('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gi rnam par shes pa cing so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa cing so// sna'i rnam par shes pa cing so// lce'i rnam par shes pa cing so// lus kyi rnam par
38b2('bum): shes pa cing so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
38b3('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
38b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gi 'dus te reg pa cing so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa cing so//
38b5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa cing so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa cing so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa cing so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
38b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
38b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
39a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba cing so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba cing so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med cing so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
39a2('bum): cing so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba cing so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
39a3('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
39a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
39a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa'i khams cing so// chu'i khams cing so/ khams cing so// rlung gi khams cing so// nam mkha'i khams cing so// rnam par shes pa'i
39a6('bum): khams cing so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
39a7('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
39b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma rig pa cing so// 'du byed cing so// rnam par shes pa cing so//
39b2('bum): dang gzugs cing so// skye mched drug cing so// reg pa cing so// tshor ba cing so// sred pa cing mi so// len pa cing so// srid pa cing
39b3('bum): so/ / skye ba cing so// rga shi cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
39b4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
39b5('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa cing so//
39b6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cing so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa cing so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cing so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa cing so// shes rab kyi pha rol
39b7('bum): tu phyin pa cing so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
40a1('bum): dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
40a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams cing so// yang dag par
40a3('bum): spong ba rnams cing so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams cing so// dbang po rnams cing so// stobs rnams cing so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams cing dmigs so// 'phags pa'i
40a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa cing so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
40a5('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
40a6('bum): dang / mi pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams cing so/ bsam gtan rnams cing so// tshad pa
40a7('bum): rnams cing so/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams cing so// rnam par thar pa brgyad cing so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu cing so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
40b1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa cing dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams cing so// ting nge 'dzin rnams cing so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams cing so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
40b2('bum): cing so/ / 'jigs pa rnams cing so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams cing so// snying rje chen po cing so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams cing so// tshe dang
40b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
40b4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa
40b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu cing so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu cing so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu cing so//
40b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid cing so// rang byang chub cing so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid cing so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang /
40b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
41a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
41a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid cing so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid cing so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid cing so// chos nyid cing so//
41a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings cing so// chos kyi gnas nyid cing so// chos skyon pa nyid cing so// yang dag pa'i mtha' cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
41a4('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
41a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang
41a6('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'ang cing so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang cing so// phyir 'ong ba'ang cing so// dgra bcom pa'ang cing so//
41a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyang cing so// byang chub sems dpa' yang cing so// sangs rgyas kyang cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid cing
41b1('bum): so/ / phyi su pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid cing so// phyi nang dmigs su pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid cing so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid
41b2('bum): stong pa nyid cing so/ / chen po stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid cing so// don dam pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid cing so// 'dus byas
41b3('bum): stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid cing so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid cing so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid su med pa'i
41b4('bum): phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid cing so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid cing so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/
41b5('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid cing so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid cing mi so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid cing
41b6('bum): so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid cing so// pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ pa stong pa nyid cing so/ dngos po
41b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid cing so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid cing so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid su
42a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid cing so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems
42a2('bum): pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa cing yongs su zhum pa la/ 'jigs sngang skrag par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//
42a3('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi
42a4('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
42a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
42a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa
42a7('bum): ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ni gi rang bzhin dang bral ba
42b1('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
42b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna ni sna'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce
42b3('bum): ni lce'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
42b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
42b5('bum): so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin dang
42b6('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dri ni dri'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
42b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ ro ni ro'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
43a1('bum): so/ / reg ni reg gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
43a2('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi rnam par shes pa ni/ gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
43a3('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
43a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
43a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
43a6('bum): rab tu shes so/ / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/
43a7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa ni/
43b1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
43b2('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
43b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
43b4('bum): tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
43b5('bum): tu shes so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
43b6('bum): bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
43b7('bum): rab tu shes so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
44a1('bum): rab tu shes so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
44a2('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
44a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
44a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
44a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
44a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
44a7('bum): khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
44b1('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
44b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
44b3('bum): tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
44b4('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes
44b5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dang gzugs ni dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
44b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
44b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor
45a1('bum): ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
45a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
45a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni skye ba'i
45a4('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
45a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
45a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
45a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
45b1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
45b2('bum): du rab tu shes so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
45b3('bum): shes so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
45b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi
45b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
45b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
45b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
46a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
46a4('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
46a5('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
46a6('bum): blta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
46a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams
46b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
46b2('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// pa stong pa nyid ni pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de
46b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
46b5('bum): tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
46b6('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
46b7('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang dag par spong pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
47a1('bum): shes so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang
47a2('bum): po lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stobs lnga ni stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
47a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral pa ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
47a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji
47a6('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / bsam gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad pa bzhi
47a7('bum): ni tshad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs pa'i snyoms
47b1('bum): par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
47b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/
47b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ni/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
47b4('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes
47b5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
47b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
47b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
48a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jigs pa bzhi ni 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
48a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
48a3('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// snying rje chen po ni snying rje
48a4('bum): chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
48a5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
48a6('bum): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin
48a7('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
48b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
48b2('bum): tu pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
48b3('bum): du rab tu shes so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam
48b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
48b5('bum): bu/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi
48b6('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
48b7('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
49a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
49a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
49a3('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / chos skyon pa nyid ni chos skyon pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang
49a4('bum): dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir byang chub
49a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa// smras pa/ tshe dang
49a6('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rang
49a7('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
49b1('bum): ro'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par
49b2('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te
49b3('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna
49b4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang
49b5('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
49b6('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin
49b7('bum): ni ji lta bu/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ len pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta
50a1('bum): bu/ rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bzod pa'i pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ brtson
50a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi stong pa
50a3('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus byas stong pa
50a4('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
50a5('bum): bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid
50a6('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
50a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji
50b1('bum): lta bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang
50b2('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/
50b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni
50b4('bum): ji lta bu/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang
50b5('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
50b6('bum): ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi gnas
50b7('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos skyon med pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni
51a1('bum): dngos po pa'o/ / 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// gi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rna ba'i rang
51a2('bum): bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// sgra'i rang bzhin ni
51a3('bum): dngos po pa'o/ / dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rna
51a4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// yid kyi rnam par
51a5('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
51a6('bum): bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
51a7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang
51b1('bum): bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
51b2('bum): pa'o/ / rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni
51b3('bum): dngos po pa'o/ / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po
51b4('bum): pa'o/ / sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
51b5('bum): phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o//
51b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// shes rab kyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// phyi
51b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa
52a1('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
52a2('bum): po med pa'o/ / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
52a3('bum): po pa'o/ / mi pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
52a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi
52a5('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
52a6('bum): pa'o/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
52a7('bum): po pa'o/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang
52b1('bum): bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// 'jigs
52b2('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
52b3('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o//
52b4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// de bzhin
52b5('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o/ / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
52b6('bum): pa'o/ / chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// chos skyon pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la
52b7('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / la
53a1('bum): gi rang bzhin pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / sna la sna'i rang bzhin pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin pa dang / yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /
53a2('bum): gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin pa dang / sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin pa dang / dri la dri'i rang bzhin pa dang / ro la ro'i rang bzhin pa dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin pa dang / chos la chos kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gi rnam
53a3('bum): par shes pa la gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par
53a4('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang
53a5('bum): bzhin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi
53a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang /
53a7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
53b1('bum): kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus
53b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin pa dang / khams la khams kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams
53b3('bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed
53b4('bum): la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dang gzugs la dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang bzhin med pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang
53b5('bum): bzhin pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / sred pa sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin pa dang /
53b6('bum): rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha tu pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
53b7('bum): pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa la bsam gtan gyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin
54a1('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha tu pa la shes rab kyi pha tu pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang /
54a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid
54a3('bum): kyi rang bzhin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
54a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid la dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang
54a5('bum): bzhin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la mi pa stong pa nyid kyi rang
54a6('bum): bzhin pa dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid la dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
54a7('bum): rang bzhin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / dbang
54b1('bum): po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang
54b2('bum): bzhin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin pa dang / tshad pa rnams la tshad pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / gzugs pa'i
54b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
54b4('bum): 'jug pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
54b5('bum): la/ mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin
54b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'jigs pa bzhi la 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i rang
54b7('bum): bzhin pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin
55a1('bum): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang
55a2('bum): bzhin pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
55a3('bum): pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid
55a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / chos skyon pa nyid la chos skyon pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pa dang / yang dag pa'i
55a5('bum): mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin par shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid do//
55a6('bum): 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// la gi mtshan nyid do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do// lce la lce'i mtshan nyid do//
55a7('bum): lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid do// yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid do// gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do// sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid do// dri la dri'i mtshan nyid do// ro la ro'i mtshan nyid do/ reg la reg gi mtshan
55b1('bum): nyid do/ / chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid do// gi rnam par shes pa la gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan

55b3('bum): reg pa la gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i

55b5('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid

55b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ / sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid do// chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// khams la khams
56a1('bum): kyi mtshan nyid do/ / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid do// nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
56a2('bum): mtshan nyid do/ / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do// dang gzugs la dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do// skye

56a4('bum): nyid do/ / skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rga shi la rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa la sbyin pa'i pha tu pa'i mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa la tshul khrims kyi pha tu phyin
56a5('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / bzod pa'i pha tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu pa'i mtshan nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha tu pa'i mtshan nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol
56a6('bum): tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ / shes rab kyi pha tu pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid do// nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa
56a7('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid
56b1('bum): la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das
56b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid la dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid

56b5('bum): do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i mtshan nyid do// dbang po rnams la
56b6('bum): dbang po'i mtshan nyid med do/ / stobs rnams la stobs kyi mtshan nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag gi mtshan nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam gyi mtshan nyid do// 'phags pa'i

57a1('bum): par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / rnam par thar pa rnams la rnam par thar pa'i mtshan nyid do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do// rnam par

57a4('bum): mtshan nyid do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan nyid do// byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid do// snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos

57b3('bum): rang bzhin do/ / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu

60b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang 'byung ba yang so// mngon par shes pa rnams
61a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang 'byung ba yang mi so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi so/

61a3('bum): yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang so/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong
61a4('bum): ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang so// byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi

61a6('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang dmigs so// phyir mi
61a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rang byang chub rang
61b1('bum): byang chub kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
61b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang
61b3('bum): dmigs so/ / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung
61b4('bum): ba yang mi dmigs so/ / chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos kyi gnas nyid
61b5('bum): chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag
61b6('bum): pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
61b7('bum): nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus
62a1('bum): yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/
62a2('bum): zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems skyed do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/
62a3('bum): de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/ khor zug
62a4('bum): rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
62a5('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bas na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
62a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang / legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
62a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la de ltar spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol
62b1('bum): tu pa stong phrag brgya ba/ bam po lnga pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
62b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te
62b3('bum): rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
62b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
62b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
62b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs bdag med ces
62b7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
63a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
63a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
63a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
63a4('bum): pas gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod

63a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

64a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ 'du shes ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
