66b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
66b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
67a1('bum): mkhas pas sna zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
67a2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
67a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
67a4('bum): thabs mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
67a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
67a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce
67a7('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
67b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
67b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce dben zhes bgyi bar
67b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
67b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
67b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus bde zhes bgyi bar spyod
67b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
67b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
68a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
68a2('bum): pas lus zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
68a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
68a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lus dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yid rtag
68a5('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
68a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
68a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yid bdag ces

68b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

69b6('bum): mkhas pas sgra dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
69b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
70a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dri bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
70a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dri sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dri bdag ces bgyi bar spyod

70a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ro rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

70b7('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
71a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
71a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

71a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
71a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
71a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
71a7('bum): reg dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
71b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

71b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos
71b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chos bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
71b5('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chos bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
71b6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
71b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chos ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
72a1('bum): mkhas pas chos dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chos dben
72a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
72a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
72a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
72a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
72a6('bum): tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi
72a7('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
72b1('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
72b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
72b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
72b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam
72b5('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
72b6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
72b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
73a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
73a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
73a3('bum): pas sna'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben
73a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
73a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
73a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes
73b1('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
73b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
73b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
73b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
73b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i
73b6('bum): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
73b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
74a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
74a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
74a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
74a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
74a5('bum): mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa
74a6('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
74a7('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// //
74b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes
74b2('bum): pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
74b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
74b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
74b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
74b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
74b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
75a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
75a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
75a3('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
75a4('bum): pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam
75a5('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
75a6('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
75a7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
75b1('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
75b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems/
75b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
75b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
75b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
75b6('bum): mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa
75b7('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
76a1('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
76a2('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
76a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
76a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
76a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
76a6('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/
76a7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

77a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
77a2('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

77a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
77a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
77a6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
77a7('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
77b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
77b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
77b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
77b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/
77b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi
77b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
77b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
78a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
78a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
78a3('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben
78a4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
78a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
78a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
78a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
78b1('bum): mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
78b2('bum): pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
78b3('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
78b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
78b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
78b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
78b7('bum): mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te
79a1('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde
79a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
79a3('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
79a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
79a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
79a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
79a7('bum): mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben
79b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/
79b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

79b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
79b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
79b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
79b7('bum): tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/
80a1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/
80a2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i
80a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag
80a4('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
80a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

80b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

82a1('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
82a2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar

82b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
82b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
82b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub
82b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
82b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
82b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
83a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
83a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
83a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
83a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
83a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
83a6('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
83a7('bum): pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi
83b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi
83b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
83b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
83b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
83b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
83b6('bum): pas/ sa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod
83b7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
84a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
84a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
84a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
84a4('bum): thabs mkhas pas/ chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams
84a5('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
84a6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
84a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
84b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
84b2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi
84b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
84b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
84b6('bum): mkhas pas/ khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
84b7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
85a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
85a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams dben zhes
85a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
85a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
85a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi
85b1('bum): khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
85b2('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
85b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
85b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
85b5('bum): rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
85b6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
85b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
86a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
86a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nam mkha'i
86a3('bum): khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
86a4('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
86a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
86a7('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes
86b1('bum): pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces
86b2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
86b3('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
86b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
86b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
86b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
86b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rnam par shes
87a1('bum): pa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i
87a2('bum): khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
87a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
87a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod
87a5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
87a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
87a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
87b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi
87b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ma rig pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
87b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
87b5('bum): thabs mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi
87b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
87b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'du byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
88a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
88a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
88a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed
88a4('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
88a5('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
88a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
88a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
88b1('bum): tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par
88b2('bum): shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
88b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
88b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
88b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
88b6('bum): mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi
88b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
89a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dang gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
89a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
89a5('bum): mkhas pas dang gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dang gzugs ma zhi zhes
89a6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dang gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
89a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dang gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
89b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
89b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched
89b3('bum): drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
89b4('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
89b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
89b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye
90a1('bum): mched drug dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched
90a2('bum): drug mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
90a3('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
90a4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
90a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
90a6('bum): mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
90a7('bum): ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
90b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
90b2('bum): thabs mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
90b3('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
90b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
90b5('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
90b6('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
90b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
91a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
91a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na

91a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
91a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ / thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa
91a6('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar sbyong na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sred pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

91b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sred pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
91b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len
91b6('bum): pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom
91b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas len pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
92a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
92a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
92a3('bum): mkhas pas len pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
92a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas len pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
92a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas len pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
92a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
92a7('bum): mkhas pas srid pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
92b1('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
92b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
92b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ srid pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
92b4('bum): mi mkhas pas srid pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na

92b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas srid pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

93a1('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
93a2('bum): skye ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
93a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas skye ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
