93a5('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
93a6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
93a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
93b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi mi rtag ces bgyi bar
93b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
93b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
93b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rga shi bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi bdag med ces bgyi
93b5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
93b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
93b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rga shi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rga shi mi dben zhes bgyi bar
94a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
94a2('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
94a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
94a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
94a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
94a6('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
94a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
94b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
94b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
94b3('bum): mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
94b4('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
94b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
94b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
94b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

95a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar

99a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
99a2('bum): thabs mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid
99a3('bum): bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
99a4('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
99a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ / thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
99a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
99a7('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
99b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar
99b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
99b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
99b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
99b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
99b6('bum): mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag
99b7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
100a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
100a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
100a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
100a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
100a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas chen po
100a6('bum): stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
100a7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
100b1('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
100b2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
100b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
100b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
100b5('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
100b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag
100b7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod

101a6('bum): mkhas pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas don dam pa stong
101a7('bum): pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
101b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

104b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
104b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dor ba pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
104b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang
104b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar
104b7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
105a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
105a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

105a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

110a1('bum): thabs mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

110a3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams
110a4('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bgyi
110a5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
110a6('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
110a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
110b1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
110b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
110b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
110b4('bum): thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu
110b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag
110b6('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
110b7('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
111a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
111a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
111a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
111a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
111a5('bum): mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams sdug bsngal
111a6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
111a7('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
111b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
111b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
111b3('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas dbang po
111b4('bum): rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
111b5('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
111b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
111b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
112a1('bum): mkhas pas stobs rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs
112a2('bum): rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
112a3('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
112a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
112a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas stobs rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
112a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
112a7('bum): mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub
112b1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
112b2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bgyi
112b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
112b4('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
112b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
112b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
112b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
113a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
113a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
113a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
113a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
113a7('bum): thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
113b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam
113b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/
113b3('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
113b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
113b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
113b6('bum): mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags
113b7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa
114a1('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden

114a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la

114a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

114b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas
114b2('bum): pas bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams
114b3('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
114b4('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

115a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
115a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas tshad med
115a3('bum): pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
115a4('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams/ bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
115a5('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
115a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
115a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
115b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
115b2('bum): mkhas pas tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
115b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
115b4('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
115b5('bum): rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
115b6('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
115b7('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
116a1('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs pa'i
116a2('bum): snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
116a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
116a4('bum): rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
116a5('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
116a6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
116a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
116b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
116b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
116b3('bum): thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams
116b4('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
116b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
116b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
116b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
117a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
117a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa de zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
117a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
117a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
117a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
117b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
117b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
117b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
117b4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
117b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
117b6('bum): la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
117b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
118a1('bum): pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo
118a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
118a3('bum): mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
118a4('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
118a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
118a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
118a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

118b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
118b3('bum): tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
118b4('bum): pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams
118b5('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
118b6('bum): ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
118b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

119a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
119a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
119a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas
119a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag
119a6('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

119b4('bum): rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
119b5('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

120a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
120a6('bum): spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das

120b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
120b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
120b4('bum): mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs
120b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben
120b6('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
120b7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
121a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
121a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas 'jigs pa rnams/ bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

121a7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi
121b1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
121b2('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
121b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
121b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
122a1('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
122a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

122a4('bum): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas snying rje chen po rtag ces
122a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas snying rje chen po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
122a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
122a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
122b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
122b2('bum): tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas snying
122b3('bum): rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
122b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
122b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
122b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
122b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

123b1('bum): pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa// bcom ldan
123b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub
123b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
123b4('bum): sgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pas rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
123b5('bum): so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
123b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin kyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin kyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba

174b7('bum): spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do/ zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du
175a1('bum): khong du chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/ mi 'jigs mi sngang / skrag par mi 'gyur
175a2('bum): na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ gnyis
175a3('bum): su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba/ mchog tu bya ba/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi
175a4('bum): 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di
175a5('bum): 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
175a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyad pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa/
175a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis/ rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
175b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

179b7('bum): de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
180a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

180a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
180a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//

184b2('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
184b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
184b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
184b5('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ / rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/
184b6('bum): 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ting nge 'dzin
184b7('bum): mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i
185a1('bum): tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyon mongs
185a2('bum): pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyon mongs
185a3('bum): pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
185a4('bum): 'tshang rgya'o/ / gnas dmigs su pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
185a5('bum): rgya'o/ / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
185a6('bum): rgya'o/ / snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyon mongs pa
185a7('bum): thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ye shes chen po'i sgron ma zhes bya
185b1('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
185b2('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting
185b3('bum): nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin
185b4('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
185b5('bum): de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/
185b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/
185b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par
186a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam
186a2('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / nam mkha' ltar chags pa pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
186a3('bum): yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
186a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ myur du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste ting nge 'dzin
186a5('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas
186a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
186a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
186b1('bum): sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang
186b2('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur
186b3('bum): to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
186b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang
186b5('bum): gzhan te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab
186b6('bum): 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin nyid
186b7('bum): kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi
187a1('bum): bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa do// smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa
187a2('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad pa'i phyir rtog pa de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
187a3('bum): rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed par 'gyur ba do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
187a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa do// 'du shes su 'gyur ba do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/
187a5('bum): rab 'byor legs so legs so// tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na/ mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
187a6('bum): kyang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// tshul khrims
187a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//
187b1('bum): dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o// stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o//
187b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o// tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
187b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
187b4('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o// snying rje chen po la
187b5('bum): bslab par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
187b6('bum): po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bzod pa'i pha rol
187b7('bum): tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi
188a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// dbang po rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//
188a2('bum): stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi
188a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//
188a4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi
188a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin
188a6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ / mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i
188a7('bum): tshul gyis slob bo/ / snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
188b1('bum): dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
188b2('bum): slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dran pa
188b3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dbang po rnams la dmigs pa'i
188b4('bum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ stobs rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/
188b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshad pa rnams la mi pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
188b6('bum): rnams la pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
188b7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ gzungs
189a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'jigs pa rnams la pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ so so yang dag
189a2('bum): par rig pa rnams la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i
189a3('bum): tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs so/ sems
189a4('bum): can mi dmigs so/ / srog mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dmigs so// gso ba dmigs so// skyes bu mi dmigs so// gang zag mi dmigs so// shed can so// shed bdag so// byed pa po dmigs so// tshor ba po mi dmigs so// shes
189a5('bum): pa po dmigs so/ / mthong ba po dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
189a6('bum): 'du byed dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so// shin
189a7('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so//
189b1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams
189b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag
189b3('bum): pa'i phyir sgra'i khams mi dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i khams mi dmigs so// shin
189b4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
189b5('bum): khams mi dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam
189b6('bum): par dag pa'i phyir/ yid kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa'i khams mi dmigs
189b7('bum): so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs
190a1('bum): so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i

190a7('bum): dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
