205b3('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
205b4('bum): dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa
205b5('bum): ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
205b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
205b7('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
206a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
206a2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
206a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
206a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad
206a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen
206a6('bum): po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
206a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
206b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
206b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
206b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
206b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ / de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa/ yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang /
206b5('bum): rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
206b6('bum): tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
206b7('bum): zhen to/ / nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid
207a1('bum): la mngon par zhen to/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dor
207a2('bum): pa med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po
207a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par
207a4('bum): zhen to/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
207a5('bum): la mngon par zhen to/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//
207a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa la mngon par zhen to// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par
207a7('bum): zhen to/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
207b1('bum): mngon par zhen to/ / snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/ mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong
207b2('bum): ngo / / ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du shes shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig mi shes mi mthong ngo //
207b3('bum): rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus shes mthong ngo // yid mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo // dri mi shes mi mthong ngo // ro mi shes
207b4('bum): mi mthong ngo / / reg mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos mi shes mi mthong ngo // gi rnam par shes pa shes mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes
207b5('bum): pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa
207b6('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //
207b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
208a1('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // chu'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // me'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // rlung gi khams mi shes
208a2('bum): mi mthong ngo / / nam mkha'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ma rig pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // ming dang gzugs
208a3('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / / skye mched drug mi shes mi mthong ngo / reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sred pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // len pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // srid pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / skye ba mi shes
208a4('bum): mi mthong ngo / / rga shi mi shes mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
208a5('bum): pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes
208a6('bum): mi mthong ngo / / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
208a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes
208b1('bum): mi mthong ngo / / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
208b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // stobs lnga
208b3('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo / / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong
208b4('bum): ngo / / tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo /
208b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs
208b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu shes mthong ngo / / 'jigs pa bzhi shes mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes mthong ngo // snying rje chen po shes mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes mthong ngo //
208b7('bum): de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas
209a1('bum): 'byung ba ma yin no/ / nyan thos kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar
209a2('bum): yid mi ches so/ / tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar
209a3('bum): yid mi ches so/ / mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
209a4('bum): mi ches so/ / yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi
209a5('bum): ches so/ / reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong
209a6('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong
209a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas
209b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus
209b2('bum): te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar
209b3('bum): yid mi ches so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid
209b4('bum): mi ches so/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid
209b5('bum): mi ches so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong
209b6('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
209b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas
210a1('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// reg pa reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
210a2('bum): tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// len pa len pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
210a3('bum): rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bzod
210a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha
210a5('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong
210a6('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po
210a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus ma byas stong
210b1('bum): pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma
210b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos
210b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong
210b4('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med
210b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong
210b6('bum): ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis
210b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/
211a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams
211a2('bum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar
211a3('bum): yid mi ches so/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
211a4('bum): pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting
211a5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
211a6('bum): so/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar
211a7('bum): yid mi ches so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
211b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes
211b2('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so/ / rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams
211b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ / de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod
211b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa
211b5('bum): ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus
211b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas
211b7('bum): pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
212a1('bum): gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams par gnas pa ma
212a2('bum): yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma
212a3('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
212a4('bum): 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma
212a5('bum): yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas
212a6('bum): pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa
212a7('bum): yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa
212b1('bum): yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs la mngon par
212b2('bum): zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/
212b3('bum): gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la/ mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
212b4('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro'i khams la mngon
212b5('bum): par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/
212b6('bum): yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la
212b7('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/
213a1('bum): skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen
213a2('bum): pa yin/ skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
213a3('bum): zhen pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/
213a4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/
213a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dor ba med pa
213a6('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon
213a7('bum): par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa

213b2('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/
213b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
213b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
213b5('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
213b6('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/
213b7('bum): rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir
214a1('bum): na byis pa zhes bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba
214a2('bum): lags sam/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/
214a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
214a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi
214a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ nang stong pa
214a6('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
214a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma
214b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid
214b2('bum): stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
214b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams
214b4('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
214b5('bum): rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar
214b6('bum): pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mngon
214b7('bum): par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi
215a1('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
215a2('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
215a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
215a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
215a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa
215a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing /
215a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
215b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
215b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod
215b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
215b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su
215b5('bum): mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
215b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
215b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/
216a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216a2('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
216a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid/ de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
216a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
216a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
216a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
216a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
216b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
216b2('bum): dpa' chen po/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
216b3('bum): pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes
216b4('bum): su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
216b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
216b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
216b7('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
217a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
217a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med
217a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
217a4('bum): tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra
217a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos
217a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
217a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
217b1('bum): ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
217b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
217b3('bum): de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
217b4('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /
217b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
217b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod
217b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
218a1('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes
218a2('bum): su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
218a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
218a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul
218a5('bum): gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
218a6('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
218a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stobs rnams la spyod
218b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
218b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
218b3('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
218b4('bum): po/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
218b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i
218b6('bum): bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
218b7('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
219a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
219a2('bum): tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
219a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi
219a4('bum): mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
219a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/
219a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
219a7('bum): pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
219b1('bum): du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
219b2('bum): med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
219b3('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
219b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la
219b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams
219b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
219b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
220a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/
220a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi
220a3('bum): mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
220a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
220a5('bum): tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par
220a6('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
220a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
220b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad
220b2('bum): shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
220b3('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
220b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams
220b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
220b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
220b7('bum): tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong
221a1('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
221a2('bum): tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma
221a3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi
221a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul
221a5('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug go// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
221a6('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
221a7('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la/ ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig la 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
221b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci
221b2('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la
221b3('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ / bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

226b6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la
226b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
227a1('bum): snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam//
227a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma

227a6('bum): te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu

227b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
228a1('bum): snyam du sems/ me'i khams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/

230b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
230b7('bum): kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
231a1('bum): zhig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/

231a6('bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
231a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
231b1('bum): du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

231b3('bum): yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
231b4('bum): snyam mam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
231b5('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
231b6('bum): lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// //
231b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so//
232a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
232a2('bum): 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan
232a3('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go//
232a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o// bcom
232a5('bum): ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom
232a6('bum): ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs
232a7('bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgra nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o//
232b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go//
232b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam
232b3('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes
232b4('bum): pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/
232b5('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid
232b6('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom
232b7('bum): ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
233a1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
233a2('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom
233a3('bum): ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
233a4('bum): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus
233a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i

233a7('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang
233b1('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
233b2('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
233b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang
233b4('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
233b5('bum): me'i khams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/

233b7('bum): khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das

234a3('bum): 'das skye mched drug/ kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid

234a7('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
234b1('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims

235a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa
235a2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/

235a5('bum): ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba
235a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang

235b1('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
235b2('bum): do/ / bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
235b3('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid

235b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom
235b6('bum): ldan 'das yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/
235b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
236a1('bum): nyid kyang dbang po rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag
236a2('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
236a3('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
