251b5('bum): rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya
251b6('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
251b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
252a1('bum): rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
252a2('bum): bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
252a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
252a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
252a5('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
252a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
252a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i
252b1('bum): chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis skabs mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
252b2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
252b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med tses bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
252b4('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
252b5('bum): yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
252b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
252b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
253a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
253a2('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
253a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
253a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
253a5('bum): dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
253a6('bum): bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems
253a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
253b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
253b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang /
253b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang
253b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
253b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi
253b6('bum): 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
253b7('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
254a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
254a2('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
254a3('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
254a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi
254a5('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
254a6('bum): tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
254b1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
254b2('bum): shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
254b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
254b4('bum): la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
254b5('bum): la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'
254b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
254b7('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
255a1('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi
255a2('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
255a3('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
255a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub
255a5('bum): kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya
255a6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
255a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang
255b1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
255b2('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
255b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
255b4('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
255b5('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
255b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
255b7('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
256a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
256a2('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
256a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
256a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba
256a5('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben
256a6('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
256a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
256b1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par
256b2('bum): shis pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
256b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
256b4('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
256b5('bum): la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems
256b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
256b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
257a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
257a2('bum): ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
257a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go ma'i 'byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
257a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi
257a5('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
257a6('bum): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
257a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
257b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
257b2('bum): kyang gzugs so/ / tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
257b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam
257b4('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/
257b5('bum): rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
257b6('bum): kyang lce'o/ / lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs
257b7('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis
258a1('bum): dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis/ reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid
258a2('bum): do/ / stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam
258a3('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna
258a4('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
258a5('bum): kyis/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus
258a6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid
258a7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid
258b1('bum): kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te
258b2('bum): reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang / lce'i 'dus te
258b3('bum): reg pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
258b4('bum): te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig
258b5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa
258b6('bum): nyid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
258b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
259a1('bum): ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus
259a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o//
259a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
259a4('bum): ba'o/ / sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa
259a5('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin
259a6('bum): gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//
259a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ma rig pa stong pa
259b1('bum): ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par
259b2('bum): shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
259b3('bum): dang gzugs so/ / skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis/ skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa
259b4('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
259b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
259b6('bum): nyid kyang srid pa'o/ / skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//
259b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/
260a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
260a2('bum): phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus
260a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
260a4('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes
260a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
260a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
260a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
260b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid
260b2('bum): do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus
260b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
260b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
260b5('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dag tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med
260b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos
260b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi
261a1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
261a2('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po pa stong
261a3('bum): pa nyid do/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po
261a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa
261a5('bum): ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid
261a6('bum): ngo / / stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang
261a7('bum): po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs
261b1('bum): rnams so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
261b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags
261b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid
261b4('bum): do/ / stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshad pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad pa rnams so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa
261b5('bum): nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam
261b6('bum): par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong
261b7('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i stong pa nyid
262a1('bum): kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam
262a2('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams
262a3('bum): so/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
262a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong
262a5('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid
262a6('bum): kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen
262a7('bum): po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid
262b1('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
262b2('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o/ / thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
262b3('bum): pa/ bam po bcu dgu pa// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/
262b4('bum): 'jigs sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs rtag ces pa

263a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul

263b1('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

263b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
263b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya
264a1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
264a2('bum): tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
264a3('bum): 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du
264a4('bum): byed zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par
264a5('bum): shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
264a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
264a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
264b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
264b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sar yongs su sngor
264b3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
264b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
264b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
264b6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
264b7('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
265a1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
265a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni// gang de la gzugs
265a3('bum): smon pa ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba smon
265a4('bum): pa ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon
265a5('bum): pa ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du
265a6('bum): byed smon pa ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam
265a7('bum): par shes pa smon pa ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
265b1('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
265b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
265b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
265b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
265b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
265b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang
265b7('bum): de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba
266a1('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
266a2('bum): de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du
266a3('bum): byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa
266a4('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
266a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
266a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
266a7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
266b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
266b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
266b3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
266b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
266b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
266b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
266b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
267a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
267a2('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
267a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la bdag ces
267a4('bum): bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
267a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar de mi
267a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
267a7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
267b1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
267b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
267b3('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o//
267b4('bum): gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna zhi
267b5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de

267b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de
268a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
268a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
268a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
268a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
268a5('bum): sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
268a6('bum): yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
268a7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
268b1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

269a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
269a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

269a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus smon pa med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i
269a5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
269a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
269a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
269b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
269b2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
269b3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
269b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
269b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
269b6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos
269b7('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
270a1('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos
270a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
270a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge

270a7('bum): sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la

270b2('bum): ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg rtag ces

274b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
275a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
275a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
275a3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
275a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
275a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag
275a6('bum): ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
275a7('bum): bdag ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ gang de la sna'i rnam par
