280b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
280b2('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
280b3('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
280b4('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
280b5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor
280b6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
280b7('bum): so sdor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
281a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
281a2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
281a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
281a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
281a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces
281a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te
281a7('bum): reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
281b1('bum): la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
281b2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
281b3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing /
281b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
281b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya
281b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi
281b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
282a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
282a2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
282a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba
282a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg
282a5('bum): pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
282a6('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
282a7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
282b1('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
282b2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
282b3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
282b4('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
282b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
282b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben
282b7('bum): zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg
283a1('bum): pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
283a2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
283a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
283a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
283a5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
283a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
283a7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar
283b1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
283b2('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
283b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
283b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
283b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
283b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
283b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi
284a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
284a2('bum): sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
284a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
284a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
284a5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
284a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
284a7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
284b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
284b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gi
284b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
284b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
284b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
284b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
284b7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
285a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos
285a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
285a3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
285a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
285a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
285a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
285a7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
285b1('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya
285b2('bum): bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
285b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
285b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
285b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar
285b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa
285b7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
286a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
286a2('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
286a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gi
286a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
286a5('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
286a6('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
286a7('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
286b1('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
286b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa
286b3('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
286b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
286b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul
286b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du
286b7('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus
287a1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
287a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
287a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
287a4('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
287a5('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

287b4('bum): la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs

287b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la chu'i khams rtag ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

288a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya
288a2('bum): bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la nam mkha'i khams
288a3('bum): rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam
288a4('bum): par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor

291a6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
291a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rlung gi khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
291b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la nam mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de dmigs
291b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par/
291b3('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab
291b4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sa'i khams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
291b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la chu'i khams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
291b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la khams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
291b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rlung gi khams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
292a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
292a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
292a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol
292a4('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gcig pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya bar de
292a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug
292a6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
292a7('bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
292b1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
292b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
292b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan ma ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
292b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smon pa ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
292b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
292b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
292b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
293a1('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

293b7('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs

296b6('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
296b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
297a1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
297a2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
297a3('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la
297a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
297a5('bum): sdor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
297a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
297a7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
297b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
297b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi
297b3('bum): rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi
297b4('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
297b5('bum): gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
297b6('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
297b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
298a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
298a2('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
298a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
298a4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis
298a5('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
298a6('bum): de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba pa stong
298a7('bum): pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
298b1('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
298b2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

298b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
298b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
298b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

299a1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
299a2('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar

299b5('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor

299b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi

300a7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug

302a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes
302a7('bum): bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas
302b1('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
302b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor
302b3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
302b4('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
302b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
302b6('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
302b7('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
303a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
303a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
303a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
303a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi
303a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
303a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

303b1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
303b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam

307b2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
307b3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
307b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
307b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
307b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
307b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba
308a1('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
308a2('bum): gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
308a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
308a4('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
308a5('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
308a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
308a7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med
308b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin
308b2('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
308b3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
308b4('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
308b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
308b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
308b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong
309a1('bum): pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
309a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
309a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
309a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
309a5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi
309a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes
309a7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid

309b2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

309b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
309b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
309b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
310a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

310a6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

310b1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
310b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

310b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag
310b5('bum): pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o//
310b6('bum): gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
310b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs
311a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
311a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
311a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

311a7('bum): rnams rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la
311b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

312a1('bum): bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi

312a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
312a5('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

312b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi

313a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
313a6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
313a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
313b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
313b2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
313b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya
313b4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom
313b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams
313b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams
313b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
314a1('bum): stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
314a2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
314a3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
314a4('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

314a7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
314b1('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang

314b5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/ zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
314b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
314b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma
315a1('bum): ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o//
