319a1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa ces bya bar de
319a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par
319a3('bum): 'du bya ba ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs
319a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o//
319a5('bum): gang de la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
319a6('bum): su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
319a7('bum): sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
319b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
319b7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
320a1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
320a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
320a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya
320a4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
320a5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
320a6('bum): gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhe zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
320a7('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
320b1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
320b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
320b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
320b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
320b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar
320b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
320b7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
321a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
321a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
321a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa bdag med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
321a4('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
321a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
321a6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtshan ma
321a7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
321b1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa pa smon pa ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug
321b2('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
321b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
321b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de
321b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos
321b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul
321b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul
322a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de
322a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de
322a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med
322a4('bum): ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams
322a5('bum): smon pa ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la mngon par shes pa
322a6('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
322a7('bum): de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o//
322b1('bum): gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
322b2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
322b3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
322b4('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
322b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
322b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
322b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o/ gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma ces bya bar/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
323a1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
323a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
323a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
323a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
323a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
323a6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
323a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos
323b1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
323b2('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos
323b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de pa'i tshul
323b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa ces bya bar de
323b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces
323b6('bum): bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes
323b7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom
324a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
324a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
324a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
324a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
324a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de
324a6('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar
324a7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
324b1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs
324b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
324b3('bum): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
324b4('bum): su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
324b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
324b6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
324b7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
325a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
325a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
325a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
325a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
325a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
325a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
325a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul
325b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i
325b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rtag ces bya bar de mi
325b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug
325b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag
325b5('bum): par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
325b6('bum): la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang
325b7('bum): de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
326a1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
326a2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
326a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
326a4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul
326a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i
326a6('bum): phyir/ de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying
326a7('bum): rje chen po rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o
326b1('bum): gang de la snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug
326b2('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
326b3('bum): su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
326b4('bum): yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de mi pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
326b5('bum): su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po mtshan ma ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
326b6('bum): yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po smon pa ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
326b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
327a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
327a2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
327a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rtag ces bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
327a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar do pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
327a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ bdag med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
327a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
327a7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
327b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i
327b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces
327b3('bum): bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
327b4('bum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
327b5('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
327b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
327b7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
328a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir/ de pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
328a2('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// rab 'byor 'di ni byang
328a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs/
328a4('bum): sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs
328a5('bum): shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mkhas te sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu ltung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
328a6('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang //
328a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
328b1('bum): bya ba med par/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
328b2('bum): sgom zhing te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
328b3('bum): des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub
328b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
328b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
328b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
328b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
329a1('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
329a2('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya
329a3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
329a4('bum): par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
329a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
329a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
329a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
329b1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
329b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
329b3('bum): gzugs dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
329b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
329b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
329b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs pa stong
330a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
330a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
330a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
330a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
330a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
330a6('bum): bya ba par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
330a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
330b1('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
330b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
330b3('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
330b4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
330b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba
330b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
330b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
331a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
331a2('bum): nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
331a3('bum): yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
331a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
331a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
331a6('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
331a7('bum): kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
331b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par
331b2('bum): tshor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
331b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
331b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
331b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
331b6('bum): gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
331b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
332a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
332a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
332a3('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
332a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes
332a5('bum): chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
332a6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
332a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
332b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
332b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
332b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes thog ma dang
332b4('bum): tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
332b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
332b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
332b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
333a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du
333a2('bum): shes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
333a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes mi pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
333a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la
333a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// pa'i tshul gyis
333a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du shes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
333a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
333b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
333b2('bum): do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/
333b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
333b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed stong pa
333b5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
333b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
333b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
334a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
334a2('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes
334a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong par nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
334a4('bum): pa med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
334a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
334a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong
334a7('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
334b1('bum): de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
334b2('bum): par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
334b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
334b4('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid
334b5('bum): kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
334b6('bum): byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
334b7('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
335a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
335a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya
335a3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
335a4('bum): rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
335a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
335a6('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
335a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
335b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don
335b2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
335b3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
335b4('bum): par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
335b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
335b6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha
335b7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya
336a1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
336a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
336a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
336a4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang
336a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa pa
336a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
336a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
336b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
336b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
336b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
336b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

336b6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la

337a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang zlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chen
337a2('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
337a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

337a6('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid

337b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
337b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
338a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

338b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

339a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
339a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma tha dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna
339a3('bum): ba dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

339b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rna ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/

339b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
339b7('bum): yid la bya ba par/ sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
340a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
340a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
340a3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/

340a5('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed

340a7('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
340b1('bum): yid la bya ba par/ sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
340b2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
340b3('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par sna dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
340b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
340b5('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
340b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ sna rang gi mtshan
340b7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
341a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
341a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
341a3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
341a4('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
341a5('bum): kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
341a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
341a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
341b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
341b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
341b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
341b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
341b5('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lci 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
341b6('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce 'dus ma byas stong pa
341b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
342a1('bum): la bya ba med par/ lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
342a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
342a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
342a4('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
342a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce chos
342a6('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
342a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
342b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lce pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mi pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa

342b3('bum): gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce ngo bo nyid stong
342b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
342b5('bum): la bya ba par/ lce dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
342b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lus nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid

343a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par

343a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
343a6('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang

343b1('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mtha' las 'das pa
343b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
343b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
