395a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i
395a2('bum): khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
395a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/
395a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa
395a5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
395a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
395a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
395b1('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams
395b2('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
395b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
395b4('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul
395b5('bum): gyis mi pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par
395b6('bum): shes pa'i khams dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
395b7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams/ ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/
396a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po pa'i ngo
396a2('bum): bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
396a3('bum): chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
396a4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
396a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa phyi nang
396a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
396a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
396b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
396b2('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam
396b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
396b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
396b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
396b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
396b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar
397a1('bum): yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
397a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
397a3('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
397a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa
397a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
397a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
397a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
397b1('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa
397b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
397b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
397b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ ma rig pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i
397b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
397b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
397b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
398a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
398a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed
398a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
398a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
398a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
398a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
398a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
398b1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
398b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed thog
398b3('bum): ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
398b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
398b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
398b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
398b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
399a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed pa stong
399a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
399a3('bum): la bya ba par/ 'du byed dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
399a4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
399a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ 'du byed dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
399a6('bum): pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
399a7('bum): la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
399b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
399b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis
399b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
399b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa chen po
399b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
399b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
399b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
400a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i
400a2('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das
400a3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
400a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
400a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
400a6('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed di/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
400a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
400b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi
400b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
400b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
400b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
400b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
400b6('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
400b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/
401a1('bum): dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
401a2('bum): yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
401a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
401a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
401a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid
401a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
401a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
401b1('bum): de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs
401b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
401b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
401b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang la/
401b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs dor ba pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis
401b6('bum): dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
401b7('bum): la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang
402a1('bum): gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
402a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
402a3('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis pa stong pa nyid kyang
402a4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
402a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs ngo bo
402a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
402a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba par/ dang gzugs dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ pa'i tshul gyis dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// //
